entry.title: Add a SIGHASH_DOUBE flag
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the consideration of a soft-fork change to SIGHASH that necessitates incorporating additional data into a transaction, specifically for enhancing the composition of Partially Signed Bitcoin Transactions (PSBTs). The conversation suggests that if modifications are required for implementing soft-fork changes to SIGHASH, it might be advantageous to also include index information beneficial for PSBTs. This approach prompts further inquiry into what steps would be necessary to progress this idea into a formal proposal suitable for inclusion in a soft fork alteration. The dialogue indicates a clear interest in exploring the technical and procedural requirements needed to advance this concept within the context of Bitcoin's development framework.
